Reviews.Title: “not the best but better than ineernational inn! ok for the money ! close to mia international !”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel day flight italy monday stayed night international inn sooooooooooooo bad free found booked 71 plus tax positively surprised dont people rated midtown inn worst etc friendly guy reception dark spacious beds tv sets perfect perfectly located front tropical pollo food wendys haha closed 10 pm worse taco bell whatsoever mexican food okay inn breakfast included cereals oh yes coffee possibility seat clumsy brazilian tourists spill hold hands whatever okay money bad okay setai miami springbreak awful grateful everone joins muggers thieves international inn southbeach hotels value money

Reviews.Content: hotel yesterday am reviewing mistake disgusting party 4 adults 2 kids budget booked inn easytobookcom barely stand stinch apartment bathroom dirty worst beds stinking dusty location dodgy definitely families slept car anyways checked escaped hotel 10 minutes bother refund hell midtown inn

Reviews.Title: “30+ Bed Bug bites”

Reviews.Content: stayed recently night 404 woke day 30 bed bug bites 10 elbow 10 legs lower extremely itchy red swollen ive bitten bed bugs time life bed bug bites feel absolutely disguising dont suggest stay especially kids

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for the Area - We had a disappointing end however”

Reviews.Content: booked night stay hotel attend miami boat travelling children impressions facility value location convenient size basic cleaning musty smell carpets dark dank bathtubs pretty dingy opted shower kids fridge arrival promptly fixed called staff friendly accomodating coin laundry facilities washer front desk assisted using hotels industrial machines greatly appreciated continental breakfast basic trick 2 varieties cereal muffins bagels donuts pastry toaster bagels toast cleaned daily sons playpen day cute unit facing road pretty noisy road construction taking disappointing moment stay wake son morning day flipped sheets bed bugs crawling investigation noticed lot excrement beds smears blood towards bottom feet needless disgusted happy leaving hope managed avoid bringing home realize climate plays role issues luxury hotels bugs living time established check checkin didnt time unfortunately returning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again, service great, location great.”
Reviews.Author: Shelli39
Reviews.Content: excellent value location bayside marketplace port ten dollar round trip cab bayside fantastic stay night leaving cruise staff extremely helpful transportation port friendly secure reasonably priced leave vehicle cruise buy package seperately continental breakfast simple price

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2008 memorial day weekend compelled write review stay simply awful checked extremely hot stuffy pool looked water changed weeks roaches crawling wall shirley housekeeper complete thief shes watch caught act taking money nightstand claims tip couldnt wait outta dump manager refund 100 money hell staying extra bucks stay else
